title: To all the Zed And Riven Mains .
body:
How do you NOT freak the fuck out when you are in a 1v1 and press all the buttons! it happens to me every time and it's super embarrassing flashing on top of myself and ulting in the wrong direction

how did you get over this ???

replies.body: practice, I like to plan ahead so my fingers know what to do
Practice on bots and make a conscious effort to remain calm and pace your commands. It's all about building muscle memory.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/d7ad4d8bc2306a28f7b6c8ba366b4398/tumblr_nuc4daD8yU1ucehy9o1_500.jpg

Disregard the title of the self-help book; the message/lesson is universal.
you dont freak the fuck out and just do your combo calmly
